scripts.dev: npm run ensure:db && concurrently "npm run dev -w @midex/server" "npm run dev -w @midex/client"
scripts.dev:server: npm run ensure:db && npm run dev -w @midex/server
scripts.dev:client: npm run ensure:db && npm run dev -w @midex/client
scripts.start: npm run ensure:db && npm run start -w @midex/server
scripts.start:client: npm run ensure:db && npm run start -w @midex/client
